contextDescription: Introduction to Unix/Linux I/O redirections, special characters, and command filters for data manipulation and text processing
learningObjectives: Understand standard input, output, and error streams in Unix/Linux
Redirect command output to files and other commands
Use pipes to chain commands together for complex operations
Apply text processing filters like grep, sed, awk, and cut
Sort and filter text data with sort, uniq, and other utilities
Master special characters and their escaping in shell commands
Create scripts for automating text processing workflows
Extract specific data from structured text files
